author: iSazonov
body: We should remove ImportSystemModules command line parameter because PowerShell Core don't care  about backward compatibility with Windows PowerShell 2.0.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @mklement0 Could you please help - should we remove anything else here?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @iSazonov I have a PR I'm already working on to remove `-sta`, `-mta`, FileConsole code, font changing code, and removing `#if CORECLR`.  I can also remove ImportSystemModules in the same PR.

title: Remove ImportSystemModules command line parameter
